short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dorado-Exchange Ad manager to show only relevant ads on web browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this ad manager and on sign up on https://doradoexchange.com/, you will able to manage your ads experience, you can choose what ads you are interested in and on view of ad you can earn credits.
